title: Launching Interop 2025
description: Interop 2025 continues the mission to make the web more consistent across browsers, building on 2024â€™s 95% interoperability score. This year, 19 focus areas target key developer needs and long-standing issues, including WebRTC improvements, Storage Access API, and CSS Zoom. The post Launching Interop 2025 appeared first on Mozilla Hacks - the Web developer blog.
author: James Graham
